json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="domains">
<prop type="array" name="verticals">
<prop type="array<@MetadataDependencies_read>" name="criteria">
<prop type="array" name="previewImages">
<prop type="array" name="previewImagesDark">
<prop type="array" name="providers">
<prop type="array" name="threatAnalysisTactics">
<prop type="array" name="threatAnalysisTechniques">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.categories.domains" options="domains">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.categories.verticals" options="verticals">
<arg type="array<@MetadataDependencies_create>" var="@MetadataDependencies_create.criteria" options="criteria">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.previewImages" options="preview-images" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.previewImagesDark" options="preview-images-dark" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.providers" options="providers" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.threatAnalysisTactics" options="threat-tactics" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$metadata.properties.threatAnalysisTechniques" options="threat-techniques" group="Properties">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.categories.domains" options="domains">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.categories.verticals" options="verticals">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@MetadataDependencies_update>" var="@MetadataDependencies_update.criteria" options="criteria">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.previewImages" options="preview-images" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.previewImagesDark" options="preview-images-dark" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.providers" options="providers" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.threatAnalysisTactics" options="threat-tactics" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$metadata.properties.threatAnalysisTechniques" options="threat-techniques" group="Properties">
